DDBAUTH-S-00001.description: User is signed out, it is necessary to sign in again

DDBAUTH-S-00002.description: User with provided email address is already exists

DDBAUTH-S-00003.description: User with provided email address is not exists

DDBAUTH-S-00004.description: There was problem when trying to sign out, try again

DDBAUTH-S-00006.description: There was problem when trying to sign in, try again

DDBAUTH-S-00007.description: Token does not match to the stored one

DDBAUTH-S-00008.description: There was problem when trying to make change with the token, try again
